name: FreshPantryRub
0:
”Alexa, open fresh pantry rub”
”Alexa, ask fresh pantry rub for texas”
”Alexa, ask fresh pantry rub for a classic rub recipe”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fresh pantry rub
des:
About to throw something on the grill or stash some meat away to be smoked tomorrow ? Now you can ask Alexa how to make 4 simple rubs with everyday items from your pantry. Current recipes include instructions for carolina, classic, kansas and texas rubs

Say "Alexa open fresh pantry rub" and follow the prompts. 

Say "Alexa ask fresh pantry rub for a texas rub" for a specific recipe.

Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
